desc: Mommy Matters is a global movement for women. We create products women need most for comfort during pregnancy and recovery postpartum. Even better, each purchase from Mommy Matters gives back to moms globally through Saving Mothers - dedicated to reducing maternal mortality through low-cost / high-impact interventions

layout.text: We are about making sure women have the comfort-enhancing products and accurate, trusted health information they need during pregnancy and beyond. Each purchase at Mommy Matters supports our sister non-profit Saving Mothers.
